features: 【Important Note】: Please be aware that our straw covers are specifically designed for stanley 30 OZ straws with a diameter of 7-8mm. For other brands or varying straw sizes, it's crucial to verify the compatibility before making a purchase to ensure a proper fit.

【8mm Straw Cap Compatibility】: This straw cap is designed specifically for Stanley 30 oz tumblers, providing a perfect fit. Additionally, its 8mm outer diameter is compatible with a wide range of straws. Please confirm the size of your straw before purchase to ensure smooth installation and use.

【Leak-resistant Performance】: The straw cap is made of high-quality material, offering an excellent sealing performance to effectively prevent beverage leakage. Whether you’re bringing your drink to outdoor activities or leaving it on your desk, you don’t have to worry about spilled beverages.

【Food-grade silicone material】: Unlike ordinary PVC material straw covers cap, our straw covers cap is BPA free, and there is no unpleasant smell, you can use it without worry, cleaning it is a breeze!Which is safe and reusable.

【Unique Design】Creative cartoon shape, cute and very decorative. The perfect gift for friends and family.Please note that there are only silicone straw caps in your package, straws and cup are not included.

【Customer Satisfaction Guarantee】: We understand the importance of product quality and service. Therefore, we promise to provide high-quality straw caps and offer satisfactory after-sales service. If you encounter any issues during use, please feel free to contact us, and we will do our best to solve your problems.
body.description: Introducing the Straw Dispenser - 7 Piece Stanley Cup Straw Caps - Keep Your Drinks Fresh! Tired of worrying about bacteria and crumbs getting into your drink? Want to pair your Stanley Cup with a stylish straw cover? Don't hesitate! Our straw dispenser has all the features and benefits you are looking for. Features and Benefits: Colorful and Cute Shapes:These straw covers not only protect from dust, but also add a touch of fun and style to your Stanley Cups. Unique and cute design makes your cup stand out from the crowd. 2. FOOD GRADE SILICONE MATERIAL: Our straw lids are made of high quality food grade silicone, safe and durable. It does not contain any harmful chemicals, so you can enjoy your drinks with confidence. 3. PRACTICAL AND REUSABLE: These straw covers are not only practical, but also reusable. They can be easily washed by hand or in the dishwasher, very convenient and hygienic to use. Say goodbye to disposable straw covers! 4. Dust and splash proof: With straw covers, you no longer have to worry about dust or splashes damaging your drinks. They are designed to keep your drinks dust- and splash-proof so you can enjoy them without interruption. 5. KEEP YOUR DRINK COOLER FOR LONGER: Our straw covers are designed to keep your drink cooler for longer. Whether you're at home, on the go or outdoors, this straw cover will keep your drink cool and refreshing. 6. PERFECT GIFT FOR GIRLS AND BOYS: This straw cover is the perfect gift for anyone who loves Stanley Mugs. Whether it's a birthday, holiday or special occasion, our woven straw sleeves will be a hit with both girls and boys. Remember, our straw sleeves are designed specifically for Stanley Mugs to ensure a perfect fit and maximum functionality. Order today for a unique experience!

reviews.reviewText: I purchased these caps for my daughters Stanley cup and the caps where to small. They do not fit the on the straw. Unfortunately I had to return them. Very cute but just did not work out.
